Description.p: Various kriging interpolations are performed on a sample dataset from a trigonometric function.
This example accompanies the contextual documentation in the toolbox online manual: kriging-interpolation-net.html
Several 1D and 2D interpolations are performed. It is shown how error information are retrieved from kriging interpolations. The applications of custom variogram functions is demonstrated.
This example requires ILNumerics Interpolation Toolbox in ILNumerics Ultimate VS version 4.9 or later.
